TextArea.value: Should the number of enrolled principal members fall below the minimum membership requirement of twenty (20) principal members, the Client shall pay for the membership fees corresponding to the twenty (20) Members until such time that the Client meets the minimum Membership requirement. However, if payment is not sufficient to offset the designated Membership fee of the enrollees based on their category, adjusted bill shall be processed accordingly,. In case where a cancelled Member shall make the total number of members below the minimum Membership requirement, Maxicare shall not refund the Membership fee for such cancelled Member
